pages.text: A one-way street that lead mana.

Generally, a Magick Context can only complete one casting, but the context pointer allows us to achieve multiple castings. The pointer can be placed on the ground, just drop the Magick Context on the pointer, and the Magick Context will be arranged in order.

As long as we right-click the context pointer with the wand, the Magick Context inside will be combined into one, and the Magick Contexts inside will be executed in order when the magic is released. If the Type carried by the Magick Context is Spell Form, then the subsequent spell will be executed after the form triggers the target.$(br2)Spell form plays a crucial role in compound spells: it is used to indicate targets, locations, directions, and other key information, which is helpful for the transmission of subsequent spells.

pages.title: Magick Context
pages.text: The compound spells for solar attack, solar de-buff, and arc de-buff are in a parallel state. If there is only one compound spell in the spell pointer, then using a wand to right-click the pointer can decompose the compound spell.

Typically, the spirit product used for casting will have default targets for casting. For example, spirit wood staff and spirit crystal staff usually target the caster themselves, while spirit swords target the entity that was hit.$(br2)If a compound spell carries three types of casting in sequence: solar attack, solar de-buff, arc de-buff, then for spirit wood staff and spirit crystal staff, the target is the caster themselves, while for spirit swords, only the hit entity will be granted de-buff effects.

In other words, a spell with a form like the one mentioned earlier is typically applied to a spirit staff, as the default target of the spirit staff is the caster themselves. If we wish to apply this spell to other creatures, we need to first generate a form (such as a Mana Arrow) and use it to transmit the spell. If we choose not to use a form spell and only use a functional spell, we can use it on a Spirit Bow and utilize the inherent Mana Arrow trait to transmit the magick.
A Spirit bow carrying a Magick Context of Solar Attack, Solar De-Buff, and Arc De-Buff.

Currently, there are not many individuals who can create their own spell forms. Spell forms can be obtained by looting creatures, and creatures with unique elements have a higher chance of dropping spell forms. Once we obtain a spell form, it is equivalent to unlocking it, and we can purchase this spell form from the mage in the future.
The mage offers already obtained spell forms for purchase.
